scripts.deploy: tsc && node dist/src/scripts/deploy.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss'
scripts.start: rm -rf dist && tsc && node dist/src/index.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss'
scripts.wstart: rmdir /s /q dist && tsc && node dist/src/index.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss'
